miniapp.name: NeetChat
miniapp.subtitle: Decentralized wallet-to-wallet messaging
miniapp.description: NeetChat is a decentralized messaging app built on XMTP protocol. Chat securely with any Ethereum wallet address, resolve ENS names and Farcaster usernames, and enjoy end-to-end encrypted conversations. Connect your wallet and start messaging instantly.
miniapp.tagline: Chat with any wallet. No sign-ups. No servers. Just crypto.
miniapp.ogDescription: Decentralized messaging built on XMTP. Chat securely with any Ethereum wallet address. No sign-ups required.
